comments:
Description:
Pull a selected table to the "Edit dataset" dialog, Dataexception throws out 
some times. But this case does not occur always.

Steps to reproduce:
1.Create a sample datasource, and create a dataset, in the "edit 
dataset"dialog, pull a table to the sql statement dialog. The error occurs.

Error log:
org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.core.DataException: Failed to prepare the 
following query for the data set type 
(org.eclipse.birt.report.data.oda.jdbc.JdbcSelectDataSet). 
[select *
from ]
Error preparing SQL statement
